DOC.brief_title: Impact Three Different Education Methods Oral Hygiene
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : The aim present study evaluate impact three different education method oral hygiene level school child use clinical theoretical finding . Methods : In present study , 144 child ( 72 male 72 female ) , whose age range 8-13 , divide 12 equal experimental group accord age gender . They consider poor hygiene . Only one three different education method ( brochure , model video ) apply group . The percentage change PI , GI , BOP theoretical test point baseline 6th month evaluate . The data statistically analyse use Kolmogorov-Smirnov One-way ANOVA test .
DOC.criteria: According Simplified Oral Hygiene Index , patient score 2 accept . According Simplified Oral Hygiene Index , patient score 2 include study
